text: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness. It is much easier to do battle with society and with others than to fight our own nature.
author: Dennis Prager

text: People must help one another it is nature's law.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

text: Limited in his nature, infinite in his desire, man is a fallen god who remembers heaven.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

text: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced.
author: Marquis de Sade

text: The primary and most beautiful of Nature's qualities is motion, which agitates her at all times, but this motion is simply a perpetual consequence of crimes, she conserves it by means of crimes only.
author: Marquis de Sade
